mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, NAME, ID, PWD, EMAIL, NICK, TEL, ENROLL_DATE, DEL_YN) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{nick}, #{tel}, #{enrollDate}, #{delYn});
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ID = #{id}, PWD = #{pwd}, EMAIL = #{email}, NICK = #{nick}, TEL = #{tel}, MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO , M.ID , M.NICK , M.TEL , TO_CHAR (M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , M.DEL_YN , A.ADDRESS FROM MEMBER M JOIN ADDRESS A ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
